t: Amazon Brand Analytics: Get data to grow your business
s: November 2, 2022 - Amazon Brand Analytics is available to brands enrolled in Amazon Brand Registry. Brand Analytics helps businesses better understand their customers and brand performance through aggregated customer search and purchase data.

t: Amazon Added Brand Stores to Search - Marketplace Pulse
s: August 20, 2020 - Amazon is testing a change to its search suggestions that adds a link to the related brand's store page. Branded searches like "adidas" have "adidas store on amazon" as an option. Crucially, unbranded searches like "men's running shoes" also have a suggested brand store.

I have raised countless tickets with SS on this - they just say its an algorithm etc. Which I would accept, but for some search terms we have number 1 share of clicks and number 1 share of conversions, as per brand analytics. We are Amazon choice product on that search term.
